name: Justin Ortiz - Capstone 2020
description:
Here is my 2020 Capstone Project. This is my first real time making a game in unreal engine 4 and my main focus was to work on my game development skills. There's still a lot to learn but I had fun in the process of making this game.

If you have any questions you can contact me here:  https://twitter.com/Zynarium
